member.name: T:Game.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Game.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Game.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Game.MainPage.SlowType(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes every out slowly with with a given time delay between each letter. Returns: Nothing. Takes Parameters: message as String, interval As String
